option.dataset: @{select a.id as aa,b.RealName as bb,concat(a.id,b.RealName) as cc from t3school as a inner join t1user as b on a.userID=b.id and a.Status_=1 and a.statusAudit=1 and b.Status_=1 and b.statusAudit=1}
option.label: cc

select.value: select a.*,b.RealName from t4student a left join t1user b on a.userID=b.id where {#condition#} order by a.id

option.dataset: @{select a.id as aa,b.RealName as bb,concat(a.id,b.RealName) as cc from t3school as a inner join t1user as b on a.userID=b.id and a.Status_=1 and a.statusAudit=1 and b.Status_=1 and b.statusAudit=1}
option.label: cc

col.label: 扩展1 已用志愿，用|隔开，如1|2|3

select.value: select a.*,b.id as idd,b.maxchoices,b.extd1,b.extd2,b.extd3,b.cnt1,b.cnt2,b.cnt3 from t4student a left join r37studentextend b on a.id=b.studentID where {#condition#} order by a.id

sql.insert: insert into t4student (@{statusAudit},@{timAudit},@{userID},@{speciality},@{SchoolID},@{EduInfo},@{timSignSchl},@{Academy}); insert into r37studentextend(studentID,maxchoices,extd1,extd2,extd3,cnt1,cnt2,cnt3) values((select max(id) from t4student where userID=@{userID}),@{maxchoices},@{extd1},@{extd2},@{extd3},@{cnt1},@{cnt2},@{cnt3});
sql.update: update t4student (@{statusAudit},@{timAudit},@{userID},@{speciality},@{SchoolID},@{EduInfo},@{timSignSchl},@{Academy}) where id=@{id}; update r37studentextend (@{maxchoices},@{extd1},@{extd2},@{extd3},@{cnt1},@{cnt2},@{cnt3}) where id=@{idd};
sql.delete: delete from t4student where id=@{id}; delete from r37studentextend where id=@{idd};

sql.update: update t4student (@{statusAudit},@{timAudit},@{userID},@{speciality},@{SchoolID},@{EduInfo},@{timSignSchl},@{Academy}) where id=@{id}; update r37studentextend (@{maxchoices},@{extd1},@{extd2},@{extd3},@{cnt1},@{cnt2},@{cnt3}) where id=@{idd};

select.value: select a.*,b.id as idd,b.cntMaxPair,b.cntMaxacc,b.detaildir,b.extd1,b.extd2,b.extd3,b.cnt1,b.cnt2,b.cnt3 from t5teacher a left join r36teacherextend b on a.id=b.teacherID where {#condition#} order by a.id

sql.insert: insert into t5teacher (@{statusAudit},@{timAudit},@{userID},@{speciality},@{SchoolID},@{Department},@{position},@{EduInfo},@{Academy},@{Profession},@{Vocation},@{project},@{direction},@{cntPair},@{cntSpeech}); insert into r36teacherextend(teacherID,cntMaxPair,cntMaxacc,detaildir,extd1,extd2,extd3,cnt1,cnt2,cnt3) values((select max(id) from t5teacher where userID=@{userID}),@{cntMaxPair},@{cntMaxacc},@{detaildir},@{extd1},@{extd2},@{extd3},@{cnt1},@{cnt2},@{cnt3});
sql.update: update t5teacher (@{statusAudit},@{timAudit},@{userID},@{speciality},@{SchoolID},@{Department},@{position},@{EduInfo},@{Academy},@{Profession},@{Vocation},@{project},@{direction},@{cntPair},@{cntSpeech}) where id=@{id}; update r36teacherextend (@{cntMaxPair},@{cntMaxacc},@{detaildir},@{extd1},@{extd2},@{extd3},@{cnt1},@{cnt2},@{cnt3}) where id=@{idd};
sql.delete: delete from t5teacher where id=@{id}; delete from r36teacherextend where id=@{idd};
